scripts.build: cd emul && verilator -Wno-fatal -I../rtl --cc $npm_package_config_top_module.v --coverage-line --trace --exe ../$npm_package_config_cpp ../neopixel_driver.cpp ../neopixel_hal_simulation.cpp ../test_helper.cpp ../test_helper_bsp_simulation.cpp -Mdir build -CFLAGS "-g -O3" && make -C build -f V$npm_package_config_top_module.mk
scripts.all: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build && npm run-script run && npm run-script coverage:html-report
scripts.monitor:all: nodemon -V --watch rtl --watch emul --ignore emul/build -e cpp,c,h,v --exec 'npm run-script all'
